about.name: Roy Kachani
about.line2: but everybody calls me: “Royk”. I'm a 31 years old Software developer born in Buenos Aires city, Argentina.
about.line3: I loved the web since I was a teenager. I began coding as a hobby in HTML & CSS, and I was very excited about these technologies. Then, at 27, I began self-taught in JavaScript, and my mind started blowing.
about.line4: I always studied and learned on my own, and supported by some courses.
about.line5: Right now I'm more focused on learning TypeScript.
about.line6: And of course, as a good argentinian
about.line7: I love soccer. Also listen radio, by the way I've worked for many years on this area.
about.line8: If you want to have a nice talk, do not hesitate to contact me.

about.name: Roy Kachani
about.line2: pero todos me dicen “Royk”. Soy Desarrollador Web, tengo 31 años y vivo en la Ciudad de Buenos Aires, Argentina.
about.line3: Me encanta la Web, empece a codear desde joven como hobby HTML y CSS. Luego a mis 27 estudie JavaScript de forma autodidacta y me gusto tanto que quería aprender mucho más.
about.line4: Me forme a base de cursos con profresores.
about.line5: Ahora estoy enfocado en aprender TypeScript.
about.line7: me encanta el futbol y tambien me apasiona escuchar la radio, que por cierto trabajé en ella muchos años como Tecnico operado de Radio.
about.line8: Si quieres ponerte en contacto, no lo dudes, hablemos!
